name: National Cost
overview:
Welcome to National Cost : Containment, Audit, Consulting Our customers partner with us to cut costs and find efficient new ways to run their business. Whether you’re a school, hospital, service company, manufacturer, wholesaler or distributor, you will save on the products and services you need when you work with us. Talk to us and learn how you can tap into our expertise and lower your costs for products and services you need to run your business.

Our Advantages Our ability to aggregate spend Very simply, our major advantage is our large customer base creating a huge leverage in the marketplace … over $150 billion in spend for hundreds of products and services you need to run your business. When you work with us, we leverage you to a better buying position! Our industry expertise We have experience sourcing products and services for thousands of customers. Our sourcing experts have acquired an extensive understanding of our customers’ operations. We understand business complexities and challenges, and have a proven record of developing executable business solutions. Our strategic sourcing approach Our strategic sourcing process provides the single greatest opportunity for customers to control costs and produce savings on products and services they need to run their business. Structured, proven, efficient sourcing process Each project tailored to meet customer needs Customer support never ends … before the program begins, during the negotiation, and after the contract is signed.

products.name: Accounts Payable and Sales Tax Auditing

milestones.description: National Cost Expansion of Service Coupled with a New No-Fee Guarantee makes for Advantageous Small Business Savings
